long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoRaider, the browser extension designed to enhance your experience on AutoTrader, making it as seamless and in-depth as possible. By incorporating fields that are not typically displayed on initial listings, AutoRaider streamlines the process of finding your next vehicle, reducing the time and effort involved.

Current Features:
✅ Ad Control: Hide specific types of ads, such as lease deals and recommended items, or opt to remove all ads for a cleaner browsing experience

✅ Customizable Display Options: Choose any standard AutoTrader field to display on each advert card, including 0-60 time, BHP, vehicle weight

✅ Enhanced Data Insights: Access custom fields based on existing AutoTrader data, such as power per tonne and the advert listing date, for deeper insights


Planned Future Features:
☐ Advanced Search and Filtering: Implement more sophisticated filtering capabilities to help find the perfect vehicle more easily

☐ Expanded Vehicle Support: Extend functionality to include vans, bikes, motorhomes, and more

☐ Browser Compatibility: Develop versions of the extension for Safari and Firefox.

☐ Non-Runner/Spares and Repairs Flag: Automatically flag listings that are for non-runners or spares and repairs

☐ Advert Notes Section: Allow adding personal notes to each advert

☐ MOT History Check Tool: Incorporate an MOT history check feature on each listing page


*Please note: The availability of additional information is dependent on the completeness and accuracy of the data provided by the seller in the advert. Instances of incomplete or incorrect information may occur.
